Package factory

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • factory.Robot
  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    A robot can carry one box at a time and put it on a coveyer belt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Robot()
      creates a robot, no Box carried at creation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean carryingBox()
      returns true iff this robot is carrying a box
      Box getCarriedBox()
      returns the carried box
      boolean putOn​(ConveyerBelt belt)
      this robot puts the carried box on the belt
      void take​(Box box)
      this robot takes a box if it was not already carrying one, else nothing happens

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot()
        creates a robot, no Box carried at creation

    • Method Detail

      • carryingBox

        public boolean carryingBox()
        returns true iff this robot is carrying a box
        Returns:
        true iff this robot is carrying a box

      • getCarriedBox

        public Box getCarriedBox()
        returns the carried box
        Returns:
        the carried box

      • take

        public void take​(Box box)
        this robot takes a box if it was not already carrying one, else nothing happens
        Parameters:
        box - the carried box

      • putOn

        public boolean putOn​(ConveyerBelt belt)
        this robot puts the carried box on the belt
        Parameters:
        belt - the belt on which box is put
        Returns:
        true if box has been put on the belt and false if it has not been possible : either no box was carried, or belt was full or carried box was too heavy
